definition: to diverge (from bearing, flight path etc)/off course/to yaw
to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations

sentences.english: It introduces the motion requirement and the structural characters of yawing and variable pitch.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了偏航和變槳距系統結構特點和動作要求。

sentences.english: The S-IVB stage has its single engine gimbaled in pitch and yaw.
sentences.chinese: IVB級有一個單獨擺動發動機來作俯仰和偏航。

sentences.english: We have got control problem, yaw damper inoperative.
sentences.chinese: 我們操作系統故障，偏航阻尼器不工作了。

sentences.english: We have got control problem, yaw damper inoperative .
sentences.chinese: 我們操作系統故障，偏航阻尼器不工作了。

sentences.english: The rudder controls yaw exactly like the rudder on a boat.
sentences.chinese: 方向舵控制偏航就想船上的方向舵一樣。

sentences.english: Table 1 gives the fatigue yaw moment exerted on the 4 yaw pinions.
sentences.chinese: 表1給出了施加在四個偏航小齒輪上的疲勞偏航力矩。

sentences.english: Table 1 gives the fatigue yaw moment exerted on the 4 yaw pinions.
sentences.chinese: 表1給出了施加在四個偏航小齒輪上的疲勞偏航力矩。

sentences.english: The drive of nacelles with active yaw systems shall be provided with a braking system.
sentences.chinese: 配備主動偏航系統的機艙驅動應有一套制動系統。

definition: course/direction (a ship or plane is heading in)
wake (trailing behind a ship, airplane etc)/slipstream
